desc: We know it can be hard to eat enough fruits and veggies. They take time to prep, they're messy, and don't always taste good. But without them you lack energy and vitality. Ruvi is an easier, tastier way to get your fruits and veggies. Simply pour the freeze-dried powder into a shaker bottle with water, shake and drink!

layout.text: DELIBERATELY DESIGNED TO POWER YOUR HEALTH
